verses.verse: And I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%>, I pray you, O <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and ye <S%H7101>princes<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; Is it not for you to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>?

Who <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%>, and <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%>; who pluck <S%H1497>off<s%> their <S%H5785>skin<s%> from off them, and their <S%H7607>flesh<s%> from off their <S%H6106>bones<s%>;

Who also <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7607>flesh<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H6584>flay<s%> their <S%H5785>skin<s%> from off them; and they <S%H6476>break<s%> their <S%H6106>bones<s%>, and chop them in <S%H6566>pieces<s%>, as for the <S%H5518>pot<s%>, and as <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H7037>caldron<s%>.

Then shall they <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, but he will not <S%H6030>hear<s%> them: he will even <S%H5641>hide<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from them at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, as they have behaved themselves <S%H7489>ill<s%> in their <S%H4611>doings<s%>.

¶ Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> concerning the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that make my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8582>err<s%>, that <S%H5391>bite<s%> with their <S%H8127>teeth<s%>, and <S%H7121>cry<s%>, <S%H7965>Peace<s%>; and he that <S%H5414>putteth<s%> not into their <S%H6310>mouths<s%>, they even <S%H6942>prepare<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> against him.

Therefore <S%H3915>night<s%> shall be unto you, that ye shall not have a <S%H2377>vision<s%>; and it shall be <S%H2821%H2821>dark<s%> unto you, that ye shall not <S%H7080>divine<s%>; and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall go <S%H935>down<s%> over the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and the <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be <S%H6937>dark<s%> over them.

Then shall the <S%H2374>seers<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, and the <S%H7080>diviners<s%> <S%H2659>confounded<s%>: yea, they shall all <S%H5844>cover<s%> their <S%H8222>lips<s%>; for there is no <S%H4617>answer<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ But <S%H199>truly<s%> I am <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H3581>power<s%> by the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and of <S%H1369>might<s%>, to <S%H5046>declare<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H6588>transgression<s%>, and to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2403>sin<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> this, I pray you, ye <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H7101>princes<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that <S%H8581>abhor<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and <S%H6140>pervert<s%> all <S%H3477>equity<s%>.

The <S%H7218>heads<s%> thereof <S%H8199>judge<s%> for <S%H7810>reward<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> thereof <S%H3384>teach<s%> for <S%H4242>hire<s%>, and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> thereof <S%H7080>divine<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%>: yet will they <S%H8172>lean<s%> upon the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Is not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> us? none <S%H7451>evil<s%> can <S%H935>come<s%> upon us.

Therefore shall <S%H6726>Zion<s%> for your <S%H1558>sake<s%> be <S%H2790>plowed<s%> as a <S%H7704>field<s%>, and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall become <S%H5856>heaps<s%>, and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> as the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>.
